name: TigerX-NCF
description:
"TigerX" for Naga College Foundation (NCF) community. A simple and short game concept.

Controls for this game (PC)

  • Right Key - To go right
  • Left Key - To go left
  • Space - To Jump
  • Z - Flamethrower (you cannot use this when the character is moving)
  • X - Fire Ball

Buttons is available for mobile devices.

  • This game is made with GDevelop5.
  • The health of the player is unlimited restarting the game is when the player is falling into the water. It's up to you if you want to continue this game. This is just a concept. 

The assets used in this game:

https://ansimuz.itch.io/sunnyland-forest-of-illusion

https://ansimuz.itch.io/sunnyland-enemies-extended-pack
